name: Smash House Brooklyn
address: 1387 Coney Island Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11230, USA

reviews.text: My food was ready very quickly and was delicious

I love coming here after a long shift. The loaded smash combo is a must 10/10. The front house is very respectful and interactive with their customers, from the moment I walked in they greeted me with real genuine smiles and were super patient taking my order. It‚Äôs very rare to find a great spot that go above and beyond for their customers.
I‚Äôm so happy smash house opened up in Brooklyn I‚Äôve been waiting for years now I go every single day. The prices are amazing I always have a blast with my buddy‚Äôs can‚Äôt wait to go again.

Service in the store is something special walking in the store getting Creed with a nice smile from older workers in the store. I never in my life had such a good Smashburger. The experience was brilliant.

We ordered in and the food came earlier than expected. Everything was fresh and delicious. Everyone finished all their food, barely a crumb leftover. The smash sauce for the burger was like a cherry on top of a sundae; perfect!

Very good food, I came here with my mother for a quick munch and the options that are were there were just great, we had the blooming onion
10/10!
Got some popcorn chicken, fries and the hot dogs are very nicely cooked. Been ordering every weekend üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è recently just had the buffalo sauce wings, finger licking for sure!
It‚Äôs a very spacious loc. The music always hits
The vibrance in there is just what draws you in as well
Front house very friendly and helpful

Absolutely awesome burgers and chicken sandwiches every time. The kosher fake cheese is down right delicious and adds great flavor to every bite. The staff brings a lot of energy and friendliness, creating a fun and upbeat atmosphere that makes it a great spot for families and groups. It is one of several locations across the country, and each one seems to be just as popular as this one.

I had really high hopes for this place given all the social media hype, but honestly, it was a major letdown. The ‚Äúsmash burgers‚Äù here are shockingly small ‚Äî more like sliders than actual burgers. You‚Äôd expect a hearty, satisfying meal for what they charge, but instead you get something that disappears in three bites.

To make things worse, the burgers are overly greasy and oily, leaving the bun soggy and the wrapper soaked through. It‚Äôs the kind of heavy oiliness that doesn‚Äôt add flavor ‚Äî it just makes you feel gross afterward. The patties themselves had very little seasoning, and the parve cheese tasted cheap and processed.

And then there‚Äôs the price ‚Äî completely unjustified for what you get. By the time you add fries and a drink, you‚Äôre paying a premium price for what feels like a kids‚Äô meal portion. There are so many better kosher burger options in Brooklyn offering bigger, better-tasting food at a lower cost.

Overall, this place feels like it‚Äôs surviving off social media hype rather than actual quality. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it unless you enjoy being overcharged for small, greasy burgers. Definitely not worth the trip or the money.
Never did i experience a kosher burger that is this good. Ill tell u a little secret the best item on their menu is the spicy chicken sando
Exorbitant price, full of oil, they asked me for an extra $5 for lettuce and tomato, go read the book, the most disgusting and disgusting place I ate at for the first and last time

This place hits every craving üòÆ‚Äçüí® Every time I pull up, whoever‚Äôs with me ends up loving it too. The spicy chicken sandwich? Unreal  crispy, juicy, and the perfect kick üî• And those single smash burgers‚Ä¶ man, I can never stop at one üò© Salty, juicy, straight flavor heaven üçî For me it‚Äôs an easy 10/10  if you actually love good food, you‚Äôll get it üíØ
Their burgers are great and poppers are the besti had anywhere! Haven‚Äôt got to try anything else out but i‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs amazing, try them out! very good prices and high quality food
Amazing food and vibe! Can't wait to be back
Amazing food, service, atmosphere and best of all PRICING!

Nice place. Burgers are overcooked and don‚Äôt come with lettuce tomato onions EtC.  the cheese is Vegan(Kosher Restaurant)  tasted pretty bland to me.  It‚Äôs not for me but maybe some will enjoy.  I will not be going back.  Expect to pay $30+ per person because it‚Äôs Kosher
Best burgers and steak sandwich. Ordered for a small party and everything arrived in a timely manner.
Very good chicken tenders! So fresh and juicy!
Best of the best - Had it over 4x in a week and a half.
To much advertising food ok nothing special
The food was amazing. Can't wait to come to the new store.

Fast and friendly service. I would have loved to give a 5 stars, but my burger experience fell short. I ordered the loaded smash burger (without the fried onions), and while the quality was there, it was overwhelmingly salty‚Äîfar too much salt. On the other hand, the chicken sandwich was very good, though a bit on the smaller side.
Amazing new place. Excellent food!!
Think it could be the best burger I‚Äôve ever had double smash with cheese wow.
very great food the service is very good  use code weber
Excellent food, fast delivery..
Amazing

Smash House has finally opened their first Brooklyn location, and while I‚Äôve been to some of the others, it‚Äôs always great to have a local one. Once again, the food was phenomenal! The atmosphere is upbeat and the staff are always eager to help you. Pictured below is their loaded smash burger with vegan cheese, crispy fries, and their coated popcorn chicken. All items were superb! Fresh, delicious, and unlike any others.
The food was delicious, it's worth every penny, and it's not expensive. So enjoy the good food.
Cool place congratulations on opening
Delicious food. Love the decor. Friendly service. This is exactly what was missing in Brooklyn.  Thank You for opening
Great food ! Amazing vibe ! Unmatched service  !
Amazing food, great service, and a place I‚Äôll definitely come back to!‚Äù
Very good food
Fast service and delicious. Will definitely be coming back!!
